word_mean: 分离，不连合的：脱离的行动或状态。遗传学指二价染色体在第一次减数分裂后期的分离##

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin disjunctio(n-), from disjungere 'disjoin' (see disjunct)
